main_definition: The ordinal number denoting the position after fourth, often used in various contexts including measurements or idiomatic expressions.

meanings_and_examples.example: He finished fifth in the race.
I ate one-fifth of the pizza.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Division or Sharing Equally Among Five
meanings_and_examples.example: The five friends decided to split their earnings evenly, each receiving one fifth of it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A common idiom meaning a person with little influence or power
meanings_and_examples.example: He's just the fifth wheel on our team, but he still helps out when needed.
